CustomField.formula: IF ( MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 1, "January" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 2, "February" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 3, "March" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 4, "April" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 5, "May" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 6, "June" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 7, "July" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 8, "August" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 9, "September" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 10, "October" , IF(MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate )) = 11, "November" , "December")))))))))))
CustomField.label: Month
